lines.text: I'm all washed up in the army. This is my last day. Say, there's an idea - we oughta celebrate.
Yeah, the army will probably do the celebrating!
How about meeting me on the dock, under the moon?
What if there isn't a moon?
I'll meet you under the dock!
No kiddin- how about you and me going places tonight when your boat gets in? Okay?
No kiddin- how about you scram until I've seen some of the scenery down here.
I AM the scenery down here. I'm Skid Johnson, the one man army. Ask anybody.
Do the tropics always smell like this?
[runs back to the woman whose hair has just burned]
[takes off overcoat, revealing a second one underneath]

[to her assistant]
Oh, there's one for you too!
You wouldn't want him running around New York in ice cream pants, would you?
I wouldn't want him running around New York at all.
